modName: Armored Troll and Co - Mounts and Followers
summary: With this mod you can summon Armored Troll and Co. (Kong, Spectral Kong, Spectral Troll, Trolls, Frost Trolls, Gehenoth) Mounts and Followers wherever you want.The DLC Dawnguard is required
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000] [size="7"] [b] Armored Troll and Co. Mounts and Followers[/b][/color][color=#00ff00][b] version 3.0[/b][/color][/size]. The DLC Dawnguard is required

[color=#00ff00][b]Optional file: Esp version Française [/b] [/color]

"Armored Troll" allow you to summon Armored Troll, Armored Kong, Spectral Trolls, Spectral Kong, Trolls, Frost Troll, Gehenoth Mounts and (-simple-) Followers wherever you want.

You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Troll"

You can find the 2 Companions/Followers (Armored Troll and Gehenoth) in the Markath Stable


To access in Vvardenfell (Morrowind) and Cyrodiil (Oblivion) with these mounts you have the 2 mods WIP: [url=http://morroblivion.com/]SKYWIND and SKYBLIVION [/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/7OUeGvM.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000] INSTALLATION (very important)[/color]

[color=#ff8c00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

1) You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#ff8c00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

2) You must place the new .esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to obtain the 12 books...(Normally, this is done automatically !)

3) (Only if you have download other mods "Summon...") You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !)

You can find the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX” and the "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Troll" at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun/Blancherive) or with an other Spell Vendor (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 1 hour (15' for the spectral mounts)

4) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001


These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not



[color=#ff0000]Bugs or Problems[/color]


1) You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have "lost" the “active” Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

2) With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

3) If you have any problem with this mount, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...

[url=https://www.4shared.com/photo/u77g9g3Dba/kong-3.html][img]https://www.4shared.com/img/u77g9g3Dba/s25/14c3888d9b8/kong-3[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000]Credits[/color]

Thanks to Muppetpuppet for the meshes and the textures of the IMGA (Kong) of his mod

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9782/?]Moonpath to Elsweyr [/url](« use everything you want »)

Thanks to viltuska (+The Beyond Skyrim team ) for the meshes and the textures of the Gehenoth in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54629/?]Gehenoth[/url]

Thanks to testiger2 for the Meshes/Textures of the 6 new Armored Trolls in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68149/?] TesTiger's Mesh Resources [/url]

New in the version 3.0: Adds 6 new summonable Armored Trolls (mounts)


New in the version 2.3: Textures and normal maps of the Gehenoth redone. Now the Gehenoth have a shadow!

New in the version 2.2.2: Adds a Gehenoth (summonable mount + companion) inspired by the mobile game "TES Travels: Dawnstar"

New in the version 2.1: You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Troll" + minor changes
